Alias.name: Practice Warrior
Alias.script: if practice_trainer:pracs_to_level() > 51 then practice_trainer:echo( "More than 51 levels required. Cannot practice this practice setup.\n", false, true ) else for _, item in pairs(practice_trainer.pracs.queue) do if practice_trainer:get_skill_class(item) == "warrior" then send("practice "..item) end end end
